articles.description: Amid a row over the status of Birsa Munda Hockey Stadium in Rourkela among major stadia across the globe, the Odisha government has said that it is the "world's largest" hockey facility in terms of seating capacity and is certified by the FIH.

articles.title: Happy 12th anniversary, Rohit and MI - Mumbai Indians
articles.description: From a promising youngster, to a star player, to captain, to the Hitman avatar, to leader personified! These 12 years almost feel like an era. Rohit Sharma has grown, Mumbai Indians have grown, we, the Paltan, have grown.
